name: Archipelago
overview: You are the only survivor of the airship, Hesperus, wrecked in a typhoon on a round-the-world attempt. Lashed to a grating, you have been washed ashore on one of a group of remote pacific islands. Running for shelter, you stumble into a cave. A passage at the back leads down into the depths of the earth. This is the entrance to avast system of undersea labyrinths which link island to island. Fabulous treasures lie within these mazes, hidden there by the high priests of a vanished race. These jewels have mystic powers and only when you have them all safely in your possession can you set foot on the next island in the chain. Dare you face the challenge of the Archipelago and win the priceless treasure? Once you have entered the maze, there is no way back! Your only protection is the primitive energy weapon. Take care, the guardians of the treasure prowl the ancient ways, swift, ravenous and deadly.
